ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol
Class ParticipantConnectionImplFactory

java.lang.Object
  ch.iserver.ace.net.protocol.ParticipantConnectionImplFactory

public class ParticipantConnectionImplFactory
extends Object

Factory class to create instances of ParticipantConnectionImpl. The factory must be initialized with a call to init(RequestFilter) before it can be used.
